page.title: 12Life on the Estate,Blackburn
page.content: Where I live on the estate there is a lot vandalism.There is glass on the play grounds and people write on the walls and slides.We use to have some fibre glass boxes to play on but{punks pulled them up and dumped them on the field. On the field next to the estate people set fires and damage the trees.There are some shops,a chemist,a newsagents,a doctors,a chip shop and a food shop.All the punks hang around the shops and{there is a lot of {violence. There are trips which the Community Wardens organize for the children and a{Community Centre}where they have karate,a playgroup and majorettes. Living on the estate is all right but I would like to move and so would my mum. Andrew aged 11.
